short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download rides data for your trips and submit it for research

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can export their rides data for their trips and submit it for inclusion in research studies. Visit https://kiran-research2.comminfo.rutgers.edu/uber-data-download/study/facebook for instructions on how to use.
